name: SCRABATTLE
description:
SCRABATTLE is an online multiplayer 1v1 pvp game where you throw words at each other to win! 

HOW TO PLAY:

-The word you write must start with the letter above you

-If the word is valid, the letters in the word will be sent to your opponent's backlog and it will also clear some letters in your backlog. Your timer will also reset

-The larger your backlog is, the faster the timer below  your textbox goes by

-Once the timer hits zero, you lose the match

CREDITS

Game by Yollie

Music by Neverdusk
